Reviews.Title: Recieved scratched Pebble Blue, not Grey
Reviews.Author: DRod
Reviews.Content: Seller: Skeater21Did not ship till 5 days after ordered placed, and several emails later, including a complaint to Amazon.  Then, seller shipped a $340.00 phone in its "own box" with a few pieces of blue masking tape holding the lid on.  The phone was floating around loose inside.  Amazingly, it is still functional.Product:Sale was for a like-new Titanium Grey Galaxy S3, but received a Pebble Blue GS3 with scratches all around the bezel.  Screen was free of large scratches and does have 16GB internal storage.  IMEI is also clean, ... so far.  Still, not what I ordered.  Don't want to go through return/reorder process.  So, Pebble blue it is.Other:Should have known better than to purchase from seller with NO feedback, but I gave it a shot.  Probably won't again.Terrible experience with this seller (Skeater21).  Stay away!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone at a Great Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Roger Leonhardt
Reviews.Content: Samsung S3 is a great phone.It is not as fast as the S4, but is an even better deal when it comes to price. If you can't afford the S4 this is the phone for you!It has many of the features of the S4 but costs hundreds lower. In my case, I got this phone for my wife used and in mint condition for almost half the price of my S4.I highly recommend it and give it 5 out of 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: BAD IMEI
Reviews.Author: Chicho
Reviews.Content: This phone worked great for about a month and was then shut down by T-Mobile for having a bad IMEI.  Was either stolen or a contract phone still owned by T-Mobile. I would not buy from this outfit again.Amazon fulfilled the order and was willing to make it right refunding my money with no hassels.
